title: Shocking Grasp
content:
Shocking Grasp Evocation Cantrip 1~8 Damage 1d8 Lightning The target cannot use reactions. This spell has Advantage on creatures wearing metal armour. 1 turn Melee Action

Evocation Cantrip

The target cannot use reactions. This spell has Advantage on creatures wearing metal armour.

Shocking Grasp is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Shocking Grasp is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the en
